home_page.slogan: Promote the massive adoption of blockchain and iterate to a trust-free future
home_page.itering_hero_section_content_desc_1: Itering is a blockchain technology company, established in Singapore,2018.
home_page.itering_hero_section_content_desc_2: The blockchain explorer Subscan we developed is a high-precision Web3 explorer which can quickly support Substrate ecological networks. In addition to searching for Block, Extrinsic, Event, and Account, it provides a user-friendly interactive experience in Staking, EVM, Parachain, and other modules. And we also provide customized services for unique functions.
home_page.itering_hero_section_content_desc_3: We focus on the research and development of blockchain infrastructure, and currently provide technical service for the Darwinia network developed based on the Substrate framework and its ecological applications Wormhole, Evolution Land, etc.
home_page.subscan_section_content_decs_1: Subscan is a high-precision Web3 explorer that aggregates Substrate ecological networks. As a multi-chain explorer, Subscan has supported dozens of excellent networks. Users can use Subscan to conveniently search and view blockchain data.
home_page.subscan_section_content_decs_2: The Subscan APIs are safe and stable, rich in types, and easy to use, which can meet the requirements of different fields of projects. We provide developers with a higher free rate limit, and for the users who have higher requirements for APIs, provide advanced customized API services.
home_page.subscan_section_content_decs_3: Subscan also provides users with tools such as multi-signature, account format conversion, and analysis charts. In addition to supporting the Substrate native module, we have custom functionality tailored for multiple networks.
home_page.projects_section_title: Some of the organizations using our tech
home_page.projects_section_desc_darwinia: Darwinia Network built on Substrate, focusing on the construction of future Internet of tokens, has supplied Cross-Chain Message Delivery Service that can be used for any token bridge.
home_page.projects_section_desc_wormhole: Cross-chain transfer of assets between multiple blockchains can be realized through Wormhole.
home_page.projects_section_desc_evolution: The first DeFi+NFT cross-chain game with each continent built on different blockchain networks.
home_page.section_1_subtitle: Promote the massive adoption of blockchain and iterate to a trust-free future
home_page.section_1_p_1: Itering is a blockchain technology company, established in Singapore,2018.
home_page.section_1_p_2: We focus on the research and development of blockchain infrastructure, especially the cross-chain technology.
home_page.section_1_p_3: At present, we are developing the DARWINIA network based on the Substrate framework, and are committed to building future Internet of tokens. In addition, we continue to explore and research in the fields of NFT and blockchain games. The blockchain game Evolution Land has been launched on the two continents of Ethereum and Tron. In the future, it will become the first important game application in the DARWINIA ecosystem.
home_page.section_2_item_1: Darwinia Network is a cross-chain bridge chain built on Substrate, focusing on the construction of future Internet of tokens, including cross-chain NFT auction market, stablecoins, cross-chain token swap exchange and markets
home_page.section_2_item_2: It supports the development and growth of future internet of tokens by building infrastructure and core applications, and help realizes tokens connected, solving the problems of scalability and isolation of blockchain networks
home_page.section_2_item_3: Different blockchain networks are connected and able to interact with each other where assets can flow freely to realize efficient cross-chain transmission of information and value
home_page.section_3_p_1: Evolution Land is a virtual business blockchain game that supports cross-chain. The game is divided into 26 continents, each of which is deployed on a different blockchain. The governance parameters are set by users autonomously. Users can buy and sell land, mine elements for them through the Apostles, build buildings, and make props.
home_page.section_3_p_2: The apostles can reproduce the inheritance genes of descendants, can upgrade their abilities by upgrading equipment and attributes, and can choose miners, warriors, doctors, musicians and other occupations in the game. Different continents will evolve into different countries, through cross-chain to achieve trade circulation between the mainland countries, war and other gameplay ...
home_page.section_4_item_1_detail: Safe and easy-to-use digital wallet and user entrance, equipped with air-isolated code scanning technology, supporting multi-scene, multi-platform, multi-application information interaction technology
home_page.section_4_item_2_detail: A streamlined online non-standard asset generation tool, through smart contracts, quickly create exclusive custom NFT assets, suitable for game assets tokenized and equity certificates and more applications
home_page.section_6_item_1_title: Itering wins funding from Web3 Foundation
home_page.section_6_item_1_detail: Web3 Foundation announced a new list of W3F Grants for its funding plan. The project Scale submitted by the Darwinia development team Itering(www.Itering.io)…
home_page.section_6_item_2_detail: The recent coronavirus outbreak has a huge impact worldwide and it also caused difficulties and uncertainties to the crypto world. Darwinia …
home_page.section_6_item_3_detail: A portion of the initial supply of the Crab‘s cRING will be distributed to the holders of RING & DOT, they will get cRING (Airdrop) for free...
home_page.section_7_subtitle: Come join us and create a reliable future together
home_page.section_7_detail_1: The team has many senior experts engaged in the development and technical research of the blockchain field, and has participated in the development of many blockchain open source projects including Bitshares, Ethereum, NEO and so on.
home_page.section_7_detail_2: We have maintained cooperation with many companies in the industry and have won web3 foundation grant.
home_page.section_7_detail_3: Our team is located in Singapore, but we have partner companies in Shanghai and Nanjing, China, which can provide multiple jobs.

about_page.about_p_1: Itering is a blockchain technology company, established in Singapore,2018.
about_page.about_p_2: The blockchain explorer Subscan we developed is a high-precision Web3 explorer which can quickly support Substrate ecological networks. In addition to searching for Block, Extrinsic, Event, and Account, it provides a user-friendly interactive experience in Staking, EVM, Parachain, and other modules. And we also provide customized services for unique functions.
about_page.about_p_3: We focus on the research and development of blockchain infrastructure, and currently provide technical service for the Darwinia network developed based on the Substrate framework and its ecological applications Wormhole, Evolution Land, etc.
about_page.join_subtitle: Come join us and create a reliable future together
about_page.join_p_1: The team has many senior experts engaged in the development and technical research of the blockchain field, and has participated in the development of many blockchain open source projects including Bitshares, Ethereum, NEO and so on.
about_page.join_p_2: We have maintained cooperation with many companies in the industry and have won web3 foundation grant. Our team is located in Singapore, but we have partner companies in Shanghai and Nanjing, China, which can provide multiple jobs.

about_page.rust_4: 4. Familiarity with one of the open-source blockchain systems, understand its architecture and core data structure;
about_page.rust_5: 5. Have a strong interest in blockchain-related mechanisms and principles, and have good learning and communication skills.

about_page.test_post_1: 1. 充分理解公司自主研发的区块链/区块链相关应用的产品需求，制定有效的测试方案，设计并维护测试用例、测试数据及测试脚本，对软件发布的全过程进行质量跟踪与风险判断根据产品需求，制定测试计划；
about_page.test_post_2: 2. 善于发现和分析定位问题，进行缺陷跟踪和管理；
about_page.test_post_3: 3. 搭建自动化框架和研发工具提升测试效率，熟练的自动化测试、持续集成、持续交付能力；
about_page.test_post_4: 4. 根据测试计划搭建和维护测试环境，高效地执行测试用例。
about_page.test_1: 1. 计算机或相关专业，本科及以上学历；
about_page.test_3: 3. 熟悉常见的开源测试工具，熟悉 Java/Python，至少了解一种脚本语言，有自动化测试在项目中落地的经验；
about_page.test_4: 4. 精通服务端测试方法，对数据服务质量有清晰认识优先；
about_page.test_5: 5. 有良好的逻辑分析能力和沟通能力；
about_page.test_6: 6. 有较强的学习能力，积极主动，有责任感，并具备良好的团队合作意识、协调沟通能力及抗压能力。

about_page.are_you_the_right_person_for_this_role: Are you the right person for this role:
about_page.what_will_you_be_doing_golang_1: 1. Use Golang to develop back-end services for web applications (including API, workers, and other components) to complete related business requirements
about_page.what_will_you_be_doing_golang_2: 2. Cooperate with DevOps and SRE engineers to integrate Sentry, Datadog, Prometheus, OpenTelemetry, and other platforms to provide rich data indicators for monitoring, early warning, and performance analysis
about_page.what_will_you_be_doing_golang_3: 3. Continue to find problems and continue to improve, and refactor unreasonable modules in a small range to make them more secure, stable, fast, and reliable
about_page.are_you_the_right_person_for_this_role_g: 1. Extensive experience in Golang development, familiar with Golang core features (such as Goroutine, etc.), and skilled in developing and debugging HTTP API with front-end engineers
2. Proficient in the use of MySQL
3. Familiar with Redis including common commands and data types
4. Familiar with Git and GitHub PR based workflow
5. Good problem analysis and communication skills
6. Good comments, documentation, logs, and testing habits
7. Passionate about the crypto-asset industry, is eager to improve and hone their knowledge in the crypto space
8. Entrepreneurial mindset with a strong sense of ownership, empathy, and determination to get things done
9. Direct experience working in a remote-first environment and able to work independently while collaborating closely with a fast-growing team
10. Bonus: Familiar with Substrate or have blockchain related experience
11. Bonus: Relevant work experience with massive data and high concurrency
12. Bonus: Active in the open source community, can provide technical blog or GitHub Profile
13. Bonus: Independent and clear understanding of best practises and technology selection
14. Bonus: Understand DevOps related concepts: basic principles of containerized application development, CI/CD, Prometheus Client SDK integration, Kubernetes Liveness Probe integration, etc.
15. Bonus: Experience with other scripting languages such as Python, Node.js, Elixir, Ruby, etc.
16. Bonus: Great written/spoken/listening communication skills in English
about_page.what_will_you_be_doing_dba_1: 1. Manage and maintain multiple MySQL 8.0 database instances currently on the Google Cloud Platform as well as keeping an eye on online database metrics and logs
about_page.what_will_you_be_doing_dba_2: 2. Cooperate with server-side development engineers to continuously improve database performance and availability through table splitting, database splitting, and multiple copies
about_page.what_will_you_be_doing_dba_3: 3. Participate in table structure design and improvement it during product development and iteration
about_page.what_will_you_be_doing_dba_4: 4. Provide development engineers with a good database experience
about_page.what_will_you_be_doing_dba_5: 5. When there is a fault alarm in the online database, cooperate with DevOps engineers to investigate the cause and repair it, and provide database-related professional knowledge, skills, and experience support
about_page.what_will_you_be_doing_dba_6: 6. Cooperate with DevOps and SRE engineers to continuously improve the database monitoring panel and early warning rules; continuously improve data reliability through timed snapshots as well as building a Disaster recovery environment.
about_page.are_you_the_right_person_for_this_role_d: 1. Familiar with MySQL 8.0 features and InnoDB
2. Proficient in the use of MySQL table sharding, database sharding, multi-copy synchronization, etc.
3. Proficient in the use of MySQL management and maintenance, master MySQL operation and maintenance such as point-in-time recovery and data migration
4. Understand relational database products of major cloud vendors (e.g. AWS, GCP)
5. Possess logical and clear problem analysis and communication skills
6. Passionate about the crypto-asset industry, is eager to improve and hone their knowledge in the crypto space
7. Entrepreneurial mindset with a strong sense of ownership, empathy, and determination to get things done
8. Direct experience working in a remote-first environment and able to work independently while collaborating closely with a fast-growing team
9. Bonus: Relevant work experience in massive data and high concurrent read scenarios
10. Bonus: Experience working with DevOps engineers
11. Bonus: Active in the open source community, can provide a technical blog or GitHub Profile
12. Bonus: Great written/spoken/listening communication skills in English
13. Bonus: Experience in the cryptocurrency industry

2. Possess overarching understanding, and have keen observation and analysis ability for visual design and color
